title: DPIAInfos
description: The description of the some data related to the data protection impact assessment (DPIA) established for the processing according to article 35 GDPR

DPIADescription.description: A description of the main foundings of the DPIA established for the processing

DPIADate.description: The date of the DPIA or the last update of the DPIA

DPIAPath.description: The path to the DPIA document
